App Técnicos

ionic cordova build --release android

Executar no CMD

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_202\bin\jarsigner" -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore "C:\Users\rklima\Documents\Workspace\SAT.MOBILE\SAT.APP.TECNICOS\_utils\app-tecnicos-key.keystore" "C:\Users\rklima\Documents\Workspace\SAT.MOBILE\SAT.APP.TECNICOS\platforms\android\app\build\outputs\apk\release\app-release-unsigned.apk" sat_mobile

"C:\Users\rklima\Documents\Workspace\SAT.MOBILE\SAT.APP.TECNICOS\_utils\zipalign" -v 4 "C:\Users\rklima\Documents\Workspace\SAT.MOBILE\SAT.APP.TECNICOS\platforms\android\app\build\outputs\apk\release\app-release-unsigned.apk" "C:\Users\rklima\Documents\Workspace\SAT.MOBILE\SAT.APP.TECNICOS\_utils\apks\app-tecnicos-release-0.0.117.apk"

NATIVE

ionic cordova run android --no-native-run --livereload --external
ionic cordova run android -l

KEYTOOL

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_101\bin\keytool" -genkey -v -keystore "I:\ionic-projects\app-tecnicos\_utils\app-tecnicos-key.keystore" -alias app-tecnicos -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000
